name: Donate to Africa
tag_list: donate, donations, cash-donation, donate-online, give, give-africa, donate-to-africa, aid, aid-for-africa, africa, charity, non-profit
overview: Donate to Africa is a registered 501(c)(3) non-profit organization founded by Frank Namukangula and Amanda Shepard. They wanted to find a solution to raising donations and awareness for the various causes impacting Africa; such as AIDS/HIV, Famine, and Education among others. Realizing there were already hundreds of organizations supporting different causes, there wasn’t an organization dedicated to raising donations and awareness for all the causes impacting Africa as a whole. In 2011, after seeing the devastating affects famine had on the horn of Africa and killing millions, they finally started the company.
